abstract.p: This document is aimed at Site Managers and describes how to make the most of their Cipher M990s. Some of these devices have not been optimally set-up by engineers and some simple tuning may improve performance dramatically. Any corrections, improvements or suggestions for this document will be most gratefully received by the author. This document does not attempt to explain to users how to use the drive since this is almost impossible to do this without complex diagrams and it is far more effective for a Site Manager to actually demonstrate the procedures to new users.
